organisation_name: Total Diet & Meal Replacements Europe (TDMR Europe)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: Total Diet & Meal Replacements Europe (formerly known as the European Very Low Calorie Diet Industry Group) is the European trade body for manufacturers and distributors of total diet replacement and meal replacement products which provide weight loss programmes for the very overweight and obese. Members of the Group currently operate predominantly in the Netherlands, Sweden, Finland, the Czech Republic, the United Kingdom, Denmark, Ireland, Cyprus, Greece and Poland.
